name: The Pig Adventure
description:
NOTE: please click on the character at first and click (space) button to move

Story,

The king is trapped in a castle . He doesn't know  what to do. Help him to get out of here. And the piggy box will help you.

My first game. Hope you like it.

Controls

hold the (space) button to move the second character

***(Credits)***

art pack by, Pixel Frog . Link - https://pixelfrog-store.itch.io
